title: A Changing view of the change of life
creator_credit: Hy Kalus, Walter Lowendahl and Dynamic Productions
brief_description: Many questions relating to menopause are answered in this candid and informative film for women of all ages, and their families. Modern medical research has made startling discoveries about this period in a woman’s life and these have altered the traditional concepts about menopause. The film presents new attitudes and shows how doctors are dealing with the physical and emotional problems.
